lead_paragraph: Steve Smith Sr., a tough, elusive, explosive receiver over 16 years in the NFL, confirmed his retirement after Sunday's loss to the Bengals in the team's regular season finale.
snippet: Steve Smith Sr., a tough, elusive, explosive receiver over 16 years in the NFL, confirmed his retirement after Sunday's loss to the Bengals in the team's regular season finale....

headline.main: Ravens Receiver Smith Calls It Quits After 16-Year Career
headline.print_headline: Ravens Receiver Smith Calls It Quits After 16-Year Career
